UniquenessLevel.description: Moniker uniqueness level to define scope of the moniker.

description: Moniker definition to match LSIF 0.5 moniker definition.

identifier.description:
The identifier of the moniker. The value is opaque in LSIF however
schema owners are allowed to define the structure if they want.

scheme.description: The scheme of the moniker. For example tsc or .Net

unique.description: The scope in which the moniker is unique
